Name: moored-buoys-and-moorings
Description: Data from moored buoys and moorings

Name: drifting-ocean-profilers
Description: Data from drifting ocean profilers, e.g. Argo

Name: ship-surface
Description: Along track surface observations from ships

Name: ship-sub-surface
Description: Profile data measured from ships, e.g. XBT, CTD, etc.

Name: tsunami-buoys
Description: Data from tsunami buoys, e.g. DART buoys

Name: autonomous-underwater-vehicles
Description: Data from autonomous under water vehicles

Name: fixed-coastal-stations
Description: Data from fixed coastal stations, e.g. sea level monitoring station, HF radars etc
